customCommands.name: analyze-structure
customCommands.prompt: Analyze the code structure and suggest improvements using LLMStruct patterns. Focus on modularity and maintainability.
customCommands.description: Analyze code structure with LLMStruct expertise

customCommands.name: add-context
customCommands.prompt: Add proper context orchestration to this code. Use SmartContextOrchestrator patterns and add relevant imports.

customCommands.name: fastapi-endpoint
customCommands.prompt: Create a FastAPI endpoint for this functionality. Include proper error handling, logging, and authentication using our existing patterns.
customCommands.description: Generate FastAPI endpoint with LLMStruct patterns

customCommands.name: websocket-handler
customCommands.prompt: Convert this to a WebSocket handler with proper session management and real-time communication patterns from our chat system.
